Package org.hck.constants

Class FrameworkConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hck.constants.FrameworkConstants
  • public final class FrameworkConstants
extends java.lang.Object
    FrameworkConstants class holds all the contents required to for the framework. Ex: Test Resources path, PropertyFiles, Drivers, Timeouts
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Harshavardhan Kavuri

    • Method Detail

      • getExtentReportsPath

        public static java.lang.String getExtentReportsPath()
        Returns Extent Report file path. If 'OVERRIDEREPORTS' property is set to 'Yes' then HTML file name with currentTimeMillis+index.html is generated else index.html file is generated.
        Returns:
        Extent Report file path
